nodes.text: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire: The Official Strategy Guide

Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire: The Official Strategy Guide was a strategy guide published by Prima's Secrets of the Games for both the PC and Nintendo 64 versions of Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire.

With Shadows of the Empire: The Official Strategy Guide, you'll learn how to defeat Boba Fett and IG-88, blast Imperial baddies, and get the secrets you'll need to ultimately destroy Prince Xizor and his Skyhook, including:
